name: to-do-list-application
description: Modern To-Do List Application © 2k25 𝕊𝕦𝕟𝕚𝕝 𝕊𝕙𝕒𝕣𝕞𝕒. All rights reserved

scripts.seed: node -e "require('./config/database').connectDB().then(() => { const Task = require('./models/Task'); return Task.create({ text: 'Welcome to MongoDB!', priority: 'medium', category: 'general' }); }).then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(console.error)"
